draft.title: SMARTYPANTS Personalised Pet Memorial Hoodie - Custom Name On Sleeve Dog Cat Owner Unisex Gift - Fur-ever In My Heart Jumper With Paw Print Heart Design - Warm Animal Lover Apparel Top
draft.description:
Keep the memory of your cherished companion close with our 'Fur-ever In My Heart' personalised hoodie. This beautifully designed pullover is more than just clothing; it's a warm embrace and a touching tribute to the pet that left paw prints on your heart.

Featuring a unique customisable sleeve with your pet's name and a sweet fist-bump graphic, this hoodie serves as a constant reminder of your special bond. Made from a premium soft cotton-blend fleece, it offers superior comfort and warmth for everyday wear. Whether you're buying it as a thoughtful memorial gift for a friend or as a comforting piece for yourself, this hoodie is a perfect way to honour a furry family member.
draft.keywords: remembrance keepsake tribute pullover sweatshirt hoody clothing garment women men mum dad sister brother friend family girlfriend boyfriend wife husband birthday christmas present sympathy bereavement condolence loss of pet rainbow bridge puppy kitty feline canine rescue petloss forever love memory loving companion best friend family member casual wear fleece comfortable cosy soft quality premium clothes personalisedgift customgift
bullets: Heartfelt Personalised Gift – Celebrate the unbreakable bond with your furry friend with this custom hoodie featuring their name on the sleeve a perfect memorial or tribute for any dog or cat lover.
Premium Cosy Fleece – Expertly crafted from a soft and durable cotton-blend fleece this pullover provides exceptional warmth and comfort making it your go-to choice for cooler days.
Everyday Practical Comfort – Designed for daily life this hoodie is machine washable and features a relaxed unisex fit with a handy front pouch pocket and an adjustable drawstring hood.
Lasting Vibrant Print – Our high-quality printing process ensures the touching 'Fur-ever In My Heart' design and custom name remain sharp and vibrant wash after wash without fading.
Versatile Memorial Apparel – A thoughtful way to keep a beloved pet close this hoodie is ideal for casual outings dog walks or simply relaxing at home cherishing precious memories.
